short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easier way to create spec sheets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easier way to create spec sheets, without all the copy-paste. Add products to your Product Library or Projects on thesheet.co directly from online stores, manufacturers’ sites and even PDFs you’ve opened in Chrome. Simply open the extension and click on anything you’d want to add to the product - images, dimensions, attributes, pricing etc.

Instructions:
1. Click on “Add to Chrome” and add the extension
2. Click Authorise if you haven’t logged in already
3. Enter your account details and login
4. Now you should see your projects when clicking on Projects select in Extension
5. Open any product on an external site (like an online store) you would like to add and open the extension
6. Click on the “Active” icon in the top right corner, click on any field you would like to fill and then click on the corresponding field on the website
7. You can also right click on any field on the website and select the field the information should go to
